ext_weather.name: Today
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Snow and blowing snow before 3pm, then areas of blowing snow and a chance of snow. Cloudy, with a high near 34. Northwest wind 15 to 30 mph, with gusts as high as 50 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 3 to 5 inches possible.
